name: market for ion-exchanger for water treatment | ion-exchanger for water treatment | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4483/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'ion-exchanger for water treatment', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of ion-exchanger that is used for water treatment. It represents an ion-exchanger used in a plant with production volume of 100 m3/h and a lifetime of 15 years, corresponding to a yearly 7,500 h operating time. The process includes building materials, land use but it excludes the energy for the manufacturing.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'ion-exchanger for water treatment',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  ion-exchanger for water treatment', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
